title: Monitoring of cyanogenic compounds behavior during the manufacturing process of sweetened bean paste

Author(s): Rie Ito, Ayaka Kikuchi, Airi Ishibashi, Tsuyoshi Kai, Akira Terashima, Yusuke Iwasaki, Takaaki Taguchi, Tomohide Fukiwake, Tomoaki Tsutsumi, Tomoaki Imamura, Hiroshi Akiyama
